name: Unable to Be Unstable (Ludum Dare 49)
description:
Unable to be Stable:

This is a game made for Ludum Dare 49 Game Jam. Game was made by me (programming/Unity) and my goddaughter (Art and Animations).

You need to save the power plant, but there might be a twist at the end so play trough all 3 Levels, they are not that hard!

Plot:
You are A scientist who needs to save a power plant that has gone unstable. Make the necessary repairs. Watch out for the robot guards as they also have become unstable and will try to kill You!

Controls (GamePad support is tested only with one controller):

  • WASD/ANALOG - move 
  • SPACE/SQR/LMB - POUR OUT THE ACID (attack)
  • Bring items (1 by 1) to the plant
  • FIX Both sides of the plant by standing CLOSE to them
